sentences.en: Acetone Finger nail polish remover , a preservative for dead frogs, an insecticide.
sentences.cn: 丙酮:指甲水和杀虫剂的组成成分, 也可用于防腐.

sentences.en: By 1853 creosote had established itself as a most reliable and persistent wood preservative.
sentences.cn: 1853年以前,防腐油已作为最可靠并能持久的木材防腐剂,而确立了它自己的地位.

sentences.en: Clearly aqueous preservative systems must possess a fixation mechanism.
sentences.cn: 显然,水溶性防腐剂必须有固定的历程.

sentences.en: Continental production and flower pots, cisterns, nursery toys, chemical preservative products.
sentences.cn: 兼产欧式花盆 、 水箱 、 幼儿园玩具 、 化工防腐产品.

sentences.en: Every piece of timber was planed, cut to size and stained with cedar preservative.
sentences.cn: 每根木材都被刨平了，切割成一定尺寸，并涂上了雪松防腐剂。

sentences.en: food that contains no artificial preservatives
sentences.cn: 不含人造防腐剂的食品

sentences.en: It has long been a precious condiment and food preservative.
sentences.cn: 它是一种珍贵的调味料和食物防腐剂.

sentences.en: It indicated that the new solution was an ideal preservative one.
sentences.cn: 结论:该保存液是一种较为理想的防腐保存液.

sentences.en: It is the most widely-used preservative for vaccines.
sentences.cn: 它是一种最为使用广泛的疫苗防腐剂。

sentences.en: It is used as a preservative in certain acid food products.
sentences.cn: 在某些酸性食物制品中它被使用作为防腐剂.

sentences.en: Phenoxyethanol ( PE ) , a preservative with aromatic ether, is used in cosmetics.
sentences.cn: 苯氧 乙醇被使用在化妆品中, 是一种含有芳香醚的防腐剂.

sentences.en: Preservative is usually added to tinned meat.
sentences.cn: 防腐剂通常加在肉类罐头里.

sentences.en: Salt has a preservative effect on food.
Salt is a common food preservative.
sentences.cn: 盐是一种常用的食物防腐剂.

sentences.en: Salt is a preservative for meat.
TBHQ is a preservative for vegetable oils and oil in the nugget.
sentences.cn: 特丁基对苯二酚是一种对动物油和植物油的防腐剂,在鸡块中用量是0.02%.

sentences.en: The no cholesterol, low - fat, high - fiber, calcium - enriched, sugar - less, preservative - additive - color - free - with - added - vitamins diet is about to become a passing fashion.
sentences.cn: 不含胆固醇 、 低脂肪 、 高纤维 、 高钙 、 低糖;不含防腐剂 、 添加剂、色素和含大量维持生活素的饮食似乎已成了过去的时尚.

sentences.en: You could say that nail polish is preservative free!
sentences.cn: 你可以说指甲油是一种免费的防腐剂。

words.tran_cn: 可保存的；可保管的；能储藏的
（对自然环境、古迹文物等的）保护主义者
保护区；禁猎地；加工成的食品
保护者，保护人；保护剂，防腐剂；储藏柜
[助剂]防腐的；有保存力的；有保护性的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 防腐处理，防护处理

trans.tran_cn: 防腐的；有保存力的；有保护性的

trans.tran_en: a chemical substance that is used to prevent things from decaying, for example food or wood
